post:
Hi,

I have a dedicated server and some space left for free Shoutcast Servers. It is meant as a test, but you can keep it for an undecided time.

I give 3 shoutcast servers away. 

The rules:
- I am not responsible for licensing. Bring your own broadcasting license. Any takedown notice by DMCA / RIAA will be taken serious.
- You have to use it.
- Maximum bitrate: 128kbps
- Maximum listeners: 50

If you want one, leave a post. First three requesters get one.
